text: Gypsies Are Found Near Heaven () is a 1975 Soviet drama movie directed by Emil LoteanuЗабытый романтик. «Табор уходит в небо» и другие фильмы Эмиля ЛотянуТАБОР УХОДИТ В НЕБО (1976) and stars Svetlana Toma, Grigore Grigoriu, and Barasbi Mulayev. ==Actors== * Svetlana Toma as Rada * Grigore Grigoriu as Loiko Sobar * Barasbi Mulayev as Makar Tschudra * Mikhail Shishkov as Nur * Boryslav Brondukov as Bucha * Vsevolod Gavrilov as Danilo * Ion Sandri Scurea as Antol Siladi * Nelli Volshaninova as Rusalina * Pavel Andrejchenko as Talimon == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1975 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Gypsies Are Found Near Heaven
